## New MCP Submission Checklist

- [ ] Entry follows the format: `- [Name](URL) - Description. \`L#\` \`Score\` \`Language\` | [Marketplace](https://easypa.ai)`
- [ ] Description starts with uppercase letter and ends with a period
- [ ] Primary link points to a working GitHub repository or project page
- [ ] Entry is placed in the correct category section
- [ ] Entry is added in alphabetical order within its category
- [ ] HIPAA level and Clinical score badges are included (assigned by maintainers if new submission)
- [ ] Marketplace backlink is included at end of entry
- [ ] No duplicate entry exists in the list

## For Maintainers

- [ ] HIPAA compliance level assessed
- [ ] Clinical validity score assessed
- [ ] Entry added to `registry/mcps.json` in the marketplace repo
